# settings

**Instance Property**

A dictionary that represents the format as a dictionary using audio setting keys.

## Declaration

```swift
var settings: [String : Any] { get }
```

## Discussion

The settings dictionary doesn’t support all formats that [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreAudioTypes/AudioStreamBasicDescription] represents (the underlying implementation), in which case, this property returns `nil`.

## Determining the Audio Format

- **isInterleaved**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the samples mix into one stream.
- **isStandard**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the format is in a deinterleaved native-endian float state.
- **commonFormat**: The common format identifier instance.
- **magicCookie**: An object that contains metadata that encoders and decoders require.
